review: I was excited to purchase Amazon Fire TV and place it in our main TV viewing room.  We used Roku 3 for several months with good results but since we are big Amazon.com fans and own a fire tablet, I decided to purchase the Fire TV.  After a week of use, I am ready to put the Fire TV in the basement and re-connect the Roku to our main TV.My biggest gripe is in the search function.  With Roku I did have to manually type my search words but it would search ALL channels.  Fire TV does not.  If a movie is available on Hulu or Netflix as a part of those memberships, it would not show up in the Fire TV search results.  Now the search by voice function is great!  BUT what good is it if doesn't provide you an accurate search result?  I hope Amazon makes a software fix for this.What do I like about Fire TV?  Optical sound output for my sound bar.  Voice search.Dislike?  Incomplete search function.  Extra step to open apps/channels (compared to Roku 3).  Cannot locate how to open video or pictures from an USB device.
